title.rendered: Robert F. Kerr | Principal Marine Surveyor

content.rendered:
As Principal Surveyor for the Shanghai Office, China since 2015, Robert overseas Marine operations in the greater China area, Japan and Korea. Robert has worked as a Marine Surveyor since 2005, carrying out Dry Bulk Cargo related Surveys, H&M and P&I entry Condition Surveys, On-Hire/Off-Hire Surveys, Pre-purchase surveys for all types of vessels ranging from Harbour Tugs to VLCC and Cape Size Bulk Carriers, Towage Approvals and Warranty Surveys for Project Cargo Loading and Discharging.

Discipline: Mariner
Specialism: Marine Warranty Surveys, H&M Cases, P&I Entry and Condition Surveys

Contact

Shanghai | +86 186 2133 2502

Specialism: Marine Warranty Surveys, H&M Cases, P&I Entry and Condition Surveys
